alice.tucson.api

Class TucsonMetaACC

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.tucson.api.TucsonMetaACC

  • public class TucsonMetaACC
extends java.lang.Object
    TuCSoN Meta Agent Coordination Context. It is exploited by TuCSoN agents to obtain an ACC with which to interact with the TuCSoN node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TucsonMetaACC() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EnhancedACC getContext(java.lang.Object agentId)
      Gets the available most-comprehensive ACC from the TuCSoN Node Service active on the default host ("localhost") on the default port (20504).
      static EnhancedACC getContext(java.lang.Object agentId, java.lang.String node, int port)
      Gets the available most-comprehensive ACC from the TuCSoN Node Service active on the specified pair node:port where node is the ip address.
      static java.lang.String getVersion()

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        public static EnhancedACC getContext(java.lang.Object agentId,
                     java.lang.String node,
                     int port)
        Gets the available most-comprehensive ACC from the TuCSoN Node Service active on the specified pair node:port where node is the ip address.
        Parameters:
        agentId - Who demand for the ACC
        node - The ip address of the target TuCSoN Node Service
        port - The listening port of the target TuCSoN Node Service
        Returns:
        The DefaultACC (which is the most powerful at the moment)
        Throws:
        UnknownACCException

      • getContext

        Gets the available most-comprehensive ACC from the TuCSoN Node Service active on the default host ("localhost") on the default port (20504).
        Parameters:
        agentId - Who demand for the ACC
        Returns:
        The DefaultACC (which is the most powerful at the moment)
        Throws:
        UnknownACCException
